api_key.description: Sets the Google Gemini API key directly in the configuration file. Note: Using `api_key_command` or environment variables is recommended for security.

api_key_command.example:
[gemini]
# Retrieve key from 1Password
api_key_command = "op read 'op://Private/Gemini API Key/credential'"
api_key_command.description: Specifies a shell command to retrieve the API key at runtime, allowing integration with secret managers like 1Password or Google Secret Manager.
